subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Harrogate, Yorkshire UK
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hello Ray

I was wondering who you were in messenger. I sent you back an add request. Welcome to the group. 

I had a chance to check your file. Water sounds are evident. I took the liberty of putting them thru my water filter. Some interesting results. I will give that to you later if I see you on.

Misty

--- On Fri, 6/20/08, Ray <evp_hgte@...> wrote:

> From: Ray <evp_hgte@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Harrogate, Yorkshire UK
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Friday, June 20, 2008, 2:00 PM
> Hi everyone just to introduce myself.  I'm Ray from
> Yorkshire England, 
> I've been doing research into EVP for a while now and
> always on the 
> lookout for improved techniques and better results.  Just
> uploaded my 
> first file under Ray's File's.  I obtained this EVP
> while exploring a 
> disused Lead Mine here in Yorkshire I was alone and armed
> with a torch 
> and Olympus VN-120pc digital voice recorder.  If you loop
> the file you 
> can hear the noise of dripping water from the roof of the
> Mine and a 
> distinct voice saying "help Me"
> 
> Thanks
> Ray
